Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
December 2020 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

On behalf of The Insider team, Happy Holidays! May these days be merry and bright, wishing you and yours a happy, healthy holiday season. But first and foremost, stay safe! In light of the increasing rate of infections from the COVID-19 pandemic occurring over the last few weeks, we encourage you to stay home and stringently follow the established safety protocols.

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

Lawyer Directory Services-Filtering: The new filtering feature allows Justia Lawyer Directory users to easily find lawyers who provide particular services in a practice area, providing them with a better user experience as well as more opportunities for our lawyers to stand out.

Automated QA for Mailing Newsletters: We continue automating our quality assurance efforts, this time, we are adding support for email marketing campaigns such as the JLD and Client newsletters, the marketing blasts, JLD monthly report, and our welcome series.

Release of the UniCourt Norm API Service: This won't bring any noticeable changes in the short term, but we are working towards building a more up-to-date JLD lawyer database, and this is one step in that direction.

Jurist Search Upgrade: jurist.org is a legal news and commentary blog powered by Justia. We recently upgraded the search feature to provide a better user experience, which will allow Jurist to reach more audiences.

Reminders

Make sure to get things done before taking days off.

Add comprehensive notes in HD or CRM if something unforeseen comes up.

Submit your PTO form on time.

Update the calendar as soon as your PTO request is approved.

Send out an email to your teammates with clear directions on how to handle specific clients or tasks.

JUSTIA HONOR ROLL

Esteban Hinojosa

We are happy to announce that Esteban Hinojosa finished the SysAdmin certification from The Linux Foundation. The Linux Foundation Certified System Administrator (LFCS) exam is ideal for candidates looking to validate their Linux system administration skillset. Congratulations Esteban, keep it up!

NEW INTERNS | NEW FULL TIME EMPLOYEES

Getting to Know the New Talent at Justia

Carlos Molina

IT Team

Hi, my name is Carlos Molina, I'm 38 years old, I'm from Hermosillo, Sonora, I have worked more than 8 years as a linux sysadmin, I like to face new challenges, and contribute as much as I can to the team. I love to spend time with my family, in my free time I like to hear music and take care of my plants.

Karla Rodriguez

IT Team

My name is Karla and I am 25 years old. I have 4.5 years of experience in the System Administrator and DevOps area. I am currently studying a master's degree in Education. I like teamwork and I hope to be an important and helpful part of the Justia team.
* She will join the team on Dec 7th.

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

The Queen’s Gambit

Available on Netflix

"The Queen's Gambit is a fictional, beautifully-shot miniseries on Netflix of an American chess prodigy girl who's on the path to becoming the best in the world. I recommend it because It shows how innate talent can only get you so far and it takes hard work, discipline, and team-work to be successful."

- Edgar Cano
